r,g,b = list(map (int, input().split()))

def work (mix):
  if mix > min (r,g,b):
    return 0
  else:
    return ((r-mix) // 3 + 
            (g-mix) // 3 + 
            (b-mix) // 3 + 
            mix)

def solve(A, ans):
  for x in [x-ans for x in A]:
    ans += x // 3
  return ans

A = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
m = min(A)
ans = solve(A, m)
if m:
  ans = max(ans, solve(A, m-1))
  if m > 1:
    ans = max(ans, solve(A, m-2))
print(ans)

  return ans

        no1=0

                r-=(mini+i)
                g-=(mini+i)
                b-=(mini+i)
                no1+=(mini-i)
        return no1,r,g,b

t = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = min(t)
s = 0
for i in range(3):
    s += (t[i] - x) // 3
    if (t[i] - x) % 3 == 2 and x > 0:
        s += 1
        t[i] = x - 1
    else: t[i] = x + (t[i] - x) % 3
        
print(s + min(t))
t = list(map(int, input().split()))
x = min(t)
if x > 0:
    p = [x - 1 + (i - x + 1) % 3 for i in t]
    print(sum((t[i] - p[i]) // 3 for i in range(3)) + min(p))
else:
    print(sum(i // 3 for i in t))
rgb = list(map(int, input().split()))

def bouquets(rgb, combined):
    combined = min(combined, min(rgb))
    return combined + sum((x - combined) // 3 for x in rgb)

print(max(bouquets(rgb, combined) for combined in range(3)))

r, g, b = map(int, input().split())
if min(r, g, b) == 0:
    print(r // 3 + g // 3 + b // 3)
else:
    r1, g1, b1 = (r - 1) // 3, (g - 1) // 3, (b - 1) // 3
    r, g, b = r - r1 * 3, g - g1 * 3, b - b1 * 3
    val = r1 + g1 + b1
    if min(r, g, b) == 1:
        print(val + max(1, r // 3 + g // 3 + b // 3))
    else:
        print(val + min(r, g, b))
